input_text:
Job Title: Sales Consultants - Premier Buick GMC Cadillac of Carlsbad

Location: Carlsbad, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
5550 Paseo del Norte, Carlsbad, CA 92008

Automotive Sales Consultant

$50,000 to $140,000+ Yearly Income! 

Excellent Training, Benefits & Career Growth!

Are you outgoing and self-motivated to EARN WHAT YOU DESERVE? Premier Buick GMC Cadillac of Carlsbad, CA is a GREAT place to have a rewarding career! We are BOOMING with Business and need to hire Sales Consultants to answer internet leads and help customers select and purchase the vehicle of their dreams! Our vehicles are top ranked in customer satisfaction! YOU WILL BE SUCCESSFUL with EXCELLENT training and support for our Management Team!  Upload your resume AND complete the assessment for immediate consideration.

Premier is a family-owned dealer group with 40 locations in 8 states with sales surpassing TWO BILLION DOLLARS! We actively give back to our community with our “Giving Hope Foundation”. Apply now and drive your career forward with our growing organization! We appreciate our employees and invest in their success!!

We Offer Excellent Benefits:

$50,000 to $140,000+ Performance-Driven Income!Premium ongoing training and professional developmentMedical, dental, and vision insurance401(k) with company match!Paid time offEmployee programs for referral bonus and auto purchases!Career advancementGreat working environmentParticipate in Giving Hope Community Service days givinghopenola.orgFind more information on our benefits and career paths at WhyPremierAutomotive.com


Responsibilities - Sales Consultant:

Help customers select and purchase the vehicle of their dreams! Bring your 'A' game and a positive attitude to work every day. Answer internet requests for vehicle pricing and availability and schedule appointments to meet in the dealershipGreet customers and identify the type of vehicle that meets their needsExplain features and demonstrate vehicle operation on test drivesPresent sales pricing and explain financing optionsFollow up with existing customers to encourage repeat and referral businessProspect for new customers


Qualifications - Sales Consultant:

Auto Sales experience is preferred but not required. Training is provided. An energetic and outgoing 'people person' that's goal oriented and self-motivated to succeedExcellent communication and customer service skillsA positive attitude, good work ethic, and professional appearanceHigh school diploma or equivalentValid driver's license and good driving record


We are an equal opportunity employer.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Sales Consultants - Premier Buick GMC Cadillac of Carlsbad
output_json.summary: Premier Buick GMC Cadillac of Carlsbad is hiring Sales Consultants for a full-time position with excellent training, benefits, and career growth opportunities.
job_responsibilities: Help customers select and purchase the vehicle of their dreams
Answer internet requests for vehicle pricing and availability and schedule appointments to meet in the dealership
Greet customers and identify the type of vehicle that meets their needs
Explain features and demonstrate vehicle operation on test drives
Present sales pricing and explain financing options
Follow up with existing customers to encourage repeat and referral business
benefits: Premium ongoing training and professional development
Employee programs for referral bonus and auto purchases!
Participate in Giving Hope Community Service days
output_json.company_information: Premier is a family-owned dealer group with 40 locations in 8 states with sales surpassing TWO BILLION DOLLARS!
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: We are an equal opportunity employer.
